resources.string: This sample Android application demonstrates how to write lint rules that enforce your team\'s architectural standards and best practices, in the form of unit tests, using Konsist.
Navigate to the \"konsist\" module in the project to explore the lint rules.
Enforce them in your CI/CD pipeline using the GitHub Action located under \".github/workflows\".

For a comprehensive guide on setup and best practices with Konsist, please refer to the blog post: \"Stop Debating in Code Reviews. Start Enforcing with Lint Rules.\" or check the official Konsist documentation.
